mapper.sql: a.id AS "id", a.parent_id AS "parent.id", a.name AS "name", a.item_type_code AS "itemTypeCode", a.check_basis AS "checkBasis", a.check_method AS "checkMethod", a.item_sub_amount AS "itemSubAmount", a.use_flag AS "useFlag", a.create_by AS "createBy.id", a.create_date AS"createDate", a.update_by AS "updateBy.id", a.update_date AS"updateDate", a.remarks AS "remarks", a.del_flag AS "delFlag"
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO bas_item( id, parent_id, name, item_type_code, check_basis, check_method, item_sub_amount, create_by, create_date, update_by, update_date, remarks, del_flag ) VALUES ( #{id}, #{parent.id}, #{name}, #{itemTypeCode}, #{checkBasis}, #{checkMethod}, #{itemSubAmount}, '1', Now(), #{updateBy.id}, Now(), '1', '0' )
mapper.update: UPDATE bas_item SET name = #{name}, item_type_code = #{itemTypeCode}, check_basis = #{checkBasis}, check_method = #{checkMethod}, item_sub_amount = #{itemSubAmount}, update_by = #{updateBy.id}, update_date = #{updateDate}, remarks = #{remarks} WHERE id = #{id}
